channel.title: Work on Daniel Hadley
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Daniel Hadley

item.title: Experiential Learning
item.description: One of the most enjoyable aspects of my job is to partner with Harvard and other local universities to teach students through project-based experience. The City gets free consulting, which is ordinarily very high caliber; and the students get a chance use their skills in a real-world environment. I just received this copy of a recent magazine article on one of our oldest, and most mutually beneficial partnerships: Linda Bilmesâ€™s Advanced Budgeting course.
